title: Blended Laboratory-Based Gamification Collaborative Learning Course: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary-level mathematics concepts (functions, calculus, statistics) and experience with basic experimental tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment using a smartphone-based virtual lab (STB-LAB) and collaboration platform (Gather Town), with offline activities limited to bimonthly in-person workshops

learning_goals: Students can design and conduct three or more virtual experiments in STB-LAB, performing mathematical modeling without physical constraints.
On the Gather Town platform, over 80% of learners complete role-based collaborative missions, achieving team project completion.
In formative assessments, over 75% of students improve self-directed learning engagement by 30% or more using gamification elements (badges, leaderboards).

resources: Low-Cost Experiment Kits for Offline Workshops
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
